paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: ATTRv amyloidosis with symptoms including carpal tunnel syndrome, gastrointestinal disturbances, ataxia, and weight loss.

individual_records.phenotype_details: ATTRv amyloidosis with symptoms including carpal tunnel syndrome, gastrointestinal disturbances, ataxia, and weight loss.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: F64L (p.F84L) mutation was encountered in 11 patients.

functional_data.summary: The F64L mutation is associated with ATTRv amyloidosis, leading to misfolded TTR protein and amyloid fibril formation.

variants.segregation_data: The F64L mutation segregates with disease in families as all patients in the study are affected.
variants.additional_notes: All patients in the study were confirmed to have the F64L mutation.
key_quotes: F64L (p.F84L) mutation was encountered in 11 patients.

individual_records.phenotype_details: ATTRv amyloidosis with symptoms including carpal tunnel syndrome, gastrointestinal disturbances, ataxia, and weight loss.

functional_data.summary: The E89Q mutation is associated with ATTRv amyloidosis, leading to misfolded TTR protein and amyloid fibril formation.

variants.segregation_data: The E89Q mutation segregates with disease in families as the patient is affected.
variants.additional_notes: The patient with E89Q mutation was also affected.
